field.name: fPhysImpulse
field.desc: Use for non-Pawn hit object; result impulse is PhysImpulse multiplied by the hit object mass

field.name: fPhysImpulseNPC
field.desc: Use for Pawn hit object; result impulse is PhysImpulse multiplied by the hit object mass

field.name: fMaxMassModifier
field.desc: If the mass of the hit object is higher than MaxMassModifier, MaxMassModifier will be use instead of the hit object mass
